title: FIFA 14 Free
description:
FIFA 14 PC game for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP
FIFA 14 (FIFA 14) is one of the best football simulators of our time. The game still looks good on all platforms and offers a very intense gameplay that includes tons of tournaments, championships, and much, much more Well, it would be worth starting with the mention that, unlike the previous games in the series, in the 14th FIFA there are even more licensed championships, national teams, club teams and more. FIFAs Games
So, finally, 19 fully and fully licensed Brazilian clubs appeared in the game, as well as the Brazilian national team. In addition, the fictional Polska Liga has finally grown into a licensed Polish championship.
And on top of that, the Argentinean premiere, the Colombian league, the Ukrainian club Shakhtar appeared along with its club stadium Donbass Arena, and more. In total, there are more than three dozen licensed leagues and more than 600 clubs with 16 thousand players. New mechanics were not long in coming either. So, firstly, the mechanics of strikes have been reworked, so that players can influence the length of the stride and the angle of approach to the ball.
New intuitive mechanics allow you to maneuver the ball so that the defenders are pushed back. And the physics of the ball’s flight has completely changed beyond recognition – now the ball really adheres to the laws of physics, it can twist, ricochet, accelerate depending on the blows and more.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8 Ghz or better
system_requirements.Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9-compatible
